Name: LU 918 - Zoning, SoHo/NoHo Neighborhood Plan, Manhattan (C 210422 ZMM)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210422 ZMM, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 918).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

LOCATING ENVIRONMENTAL REVIEW MATERIALS FOR CERTAIN LAND USE APPLICATIONS
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - December 15, 2021

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Calibri;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca, Jr. and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, New York City Department of City Planning (DCP),\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 12a and 12c, changing from an M1-5A District to an M1-5/R7X District, changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-5/R7X District, changing from an M1-5A District to an M1-5/R9X District, changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-5/R9X District, changing from an M1-5A District to an M1-6/R10 District, changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-6/R10 District, establishing a Special SoHo-NoHo Mixed Use District (SNX), which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate land use changes for a 56-block area to implement the SoHo/NoHo Neighborhood Plan in Manhattan, Community District 2 (ULURP No. C 210422 ZMM) (the "Application");\par
\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on October 22, 2021 its decision dated October 20, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 210423 ZRM (L.U. No. 919), a zoning text amendment to establish the Special SoHo-NoHo Mixed Use District in Zoning Resolution (ZR) Section 14-03 and establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on November 9, 2021; \par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf1 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Positive Declaration issued October 28, 2020 (CEQR No. 21DCP059M). Significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality and noise would be avoided through the placement of (E) designations (E-619) on selected projected and potential development sites as specified in Chapters 10, 15 and 17, respectively of the Final Environmental Impact Statement (FEIS). The FEIS determined that the proposed actions would have identified significant adverse impacts, which along with proposed mitigation measures, are summarized in Chapter 21, \ldblquote Mitigation\rdblquote  of the FEIS. The Council has also considered the Technical Memorandum dated_____;\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\cf0  \par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Having considered the FEIS and Technical Memorandum with respect to the Decision and Application, the Council finds that:\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj  \tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj\tx720\cf1 1.\tab The FEIS meets the requirements of 6 N.Y.C.R.R. Part 617; \par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\li1080\qj\tx720\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\cf1 2.\tab The environmental impacts disclosed in the FEIS were evaluated in relation to the social, economic, and other considerations associated with the actions that are set forth in this report; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\cf1 3.\tab Consistent with social, economic, and other essential considerations from among the reasonable alternatives available, the action is one which avoids or minimizes adverse environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable; and\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1080\cf0\tab\par
The Decision, together with the FEIS and Technical Memorandum constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of this determination, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. \'a7617.11(d).\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210422 ZMM, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\cf1 Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\cf0\par
The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section Nos.12a and 12c:\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\uldb 1.\tab changing from an M1-5B to an M1-5/R7D District property bounded by Prince Street, Lafayette Street, Broome Street, and Crosby Street;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj 21.\tab changing from an M1-5A District to an M1-5/R7X District property bounded by West\b  \b0 Houston Street, Mercer Street, Broome Street, a line midway between West Broadway and Wooster Street, a line perpendicular to the easterly street line of West Broadway distant 70 feet northerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the easterly street line of West Broadway and the northerly street line of Canal Street, West Broadway, Broome Street, and a line midway between Thompson Street and West Broadway;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li360\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj 32.\tab changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-5/R7X District property bounded by:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj a.\tab Great Jones Street, \uldb a line 230 feet easterly of Lafayette Street, East 4\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 140 feet easterly of Lafayette Street, a line 130 feet northerly of East 4\super th\nosupersub  Street, \ulnone a line 100 westerly of Bowery, Bleecker Street, Lafayette Street, a line 122 feet southerly of Bond Street, and a line 140 feet easterly of Broadway;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\f0\fs24 b.\tab a line passing through two points: one on the easterly street line of Lafayette Street distant 120 feet southerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the southerly street line of Jersey Street and the easterly street line of Lafayette Street and the other on the westerly street line of Mulberry Street distant 100 feet southerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of  intersection of the southerly street line of Jersey Street and the westerly street line of Mulberry Street, Mulberry Street, Prince Street, and Lafayette Street;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\f0\fs24\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj c.\tab Prince Street, Lafayette Street, Broome Street, Centre Street, Grand Street, a line 100 feet easterly of Crosby Street, Howard Street, and Crosby Street; and\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\b\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\b0\f0\fs24 d.\tab Broome Street, Mercer Street, the westerly centerline prolongation of Howard Street, Greene Street, a line perpendicular to the easterly street line of Wooster Street distant 150 feet northerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the easterly street line of Wooster Street and the northerly street line of Canal Street, Wooster Street, a line perpendicular to the easterly street line of West Broadway distant 70 feet northerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the easterly street line of West Broadway and the northerly street line of Canal Street, and a line midway between West Broadway and Wooster Street;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\b\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\b0\f0\fs24 43.\tab changing from an M1-5A District to an M1-5/R9X District property bounded by a line perpendicular to the easterly street line of West Broadway distant 70 feet northerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the easterly street line of West Broadway and the northerly street line of Canal Street, a line midway between West Broadway and Wooster Street, Canal Street, and West Broadway;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\uldb\f0\fs24 5.\tab changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-5/R9A District property bounded by Astor Place, Lafayette Street, a line 100 feet southerly of Astor Place, a line 100 feet westerly of Fourth Avenue, a line 100 feet westerly of Bowery, a line 130 feet northerly of East 4\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 140 feet easterly of Lafayette Street, East 4\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 230 feet easterly of Lafayette Street, a line 105 feet northerly of Great Jones Street, Lafayette Street, Great Jones Street, a line 140 feet easterly of Broadway, a line 122 feet southerly of Bond Street, Lafayette Street, Bleecker Street, Mulberry Street, East Houston Street, and Broadway;\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\uldb\f0\fs24 6\ulnone 4.\tab changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-5/R9X District property bounded by:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\uldb a.\tab a line 105 feet northerly of Great Jones Street, a line 230 feet easterly of Lafayette Street, Great Jones Street and Lafayette Street;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\uldb b.\ulnone\tab Astor Place, Lafayette Street, a line 100 feet southerly of Astor Place, a line 100 feet westerly of Fourth Avenue, a line 100 feet westerly of Bowery, Great Jones Street, a line 140 feet easterly of Broadway, a line 122 feet southerly of Bond Street, Lafayette Street, Bleecker Street, Mulberry Street, East Houston Street, Lafayette Street, Prince Street, Crosby Street, Howard Street, the southerly prolongation of a line 100 feet easterly of Crosby Street, a line perpendicular to the northerly street line of Canal Street distant 110 feet westerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the northerly street line of Canal Street and the westerly street line of Lafayette Street, Canal Street, a line midway between West Broadway and Wooster Street, a line perpendicular to the easterly street line of West Broadway distant 70 feet northerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the easterly street line of West Broadway and the northerly street line of Canal Street, Wooster Street, a line perpendicular to the easterly street line of Wooster Street distant 150 feet northerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the easterly street line of Wooster Street and the northerly street line of Canal Street, Greene Street, the westerly centerline prolongation of Howard Street, and Mercer Street, West Houston Street, and Broadway;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\uldb\f0\fs24 7\ulnone 5.\tab changing from an M1-5A District to an M1-56/R10 District property bounded by Broome Street, West Broadway, Canal Street, and a line midway between West Broadway and Thompson Street;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\uldb 8.\tab\f0\fs24 changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-5/R10 District property bounded by:\par
\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\uldb a.\tab Grand Street, Baxter Street, Canal Street, a line perpendicular to the northerly street line of Canal Street distant 110 feet westerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the northerly street line of Canal Street and the westerly street line of Lafayette Street, and a line 100 feet easterly of Crosby Street and its southerly prolongation;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj b.\tab\f0\fs24 a line 200 feet northerly of Broome Street, a line midway between Thompson Street and West Broadway, Canal Street, Avenue of the Americas, Grand Street, and Thompson Street;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\ulnone\par
\par
\uldb\f0\fs24 9\ulnone 6.\tab changing from an M1-5B District to an M1-6/R10 District property bounded by:\f1\fs22\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\f0\fs24 a.\tab a line 100 feet southerly of Astor Place, Fourth Avenue, Bowery, Great Jones Street, 100 feet westerly of Bowery, and a line 100 feet westerly of Fourth Avenue; \uldb and\ulnone\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj\f0\fs24 b.\tab a line 200 feet northerly of Broome Street, a line midway between Thompson Street and West Broadway, Canal Street, Avenue of the Americas, Watt Street, and Thompson Street\uldb , Grand Street, and Avenue of the Americas\ulnone ; and\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\f0\fs24\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj c.\tab Grand Street, Baxter Street, Canal Street, a line perpendicular to the northerly street line of Canal Street distant 110 feet westerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the northerly street line of Canal Street and the westerly street line of Lafayette Street, and a line 100 feet easterly of Crosby Street and its southerly prolongation; and\f1\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\b\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\uldb\b0\f0\fs24 10\ulnone 7.\tab establishing a Special SoHo-NoHo Mixed Use District (SNX) bounded by Astor Place, Lafayette Street, a line 100 feet southerly of Astor Place, Fourth Avenue, Bowery, Great Jones Street, a line 100 feet westerly of Bowery, Bleecker Street, Mulberry Street, East Houston Street, Lafayette Street, a line passing through two points: one on the easterly street line of Lafayette Street distant 120 feet southerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of intersection of the southerly street line of Jersey Street and the easterly street line of Lafayette Street and the other on the westerly street line of Mulberry Street distant 100 feet southerly (as measured along the street line) from the point of  intersection of the southerly street line of Jersey Street and the westerly street line of Mulberry Street, Mulberry Street, Prince Street, Lafayette Street, Broome Street, Centre Street, Grand Street, Baxter Street, Canal Street, Avenue of the Americas, Watts Street, Thompson Street, a line 200 northerly of Broome Street, a line midway between Thompson Street and West Broadway, West Houston Street, and Broadway;\f1\fs22\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\f0\fs24\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\sl360\slmult1 Borough of Manhattan, Community District 2, as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated May 17, 2021, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration of E-619.\par
